sdata.j: その↑頃↑↓ころ↓、↑泥棒↑↓どろぼう↓、|↑他殺|↑↓たさつ↓、↑餓死↑↓がし↓のことばっかり↑聞↑↓き↓いていたんだ。
sdata.e: During that time, we only heard about thieves, about murders, about men who had died of hunger.
